title: Is the Bible considered to be a journal? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let me perhaps prevent the next 100 spammish questions you’re going to post, Mr. Bot. No, it’s not a journal; it’s not a textbook; it’s not a short story; it’s not (except for a very few parts) poetry; it’s not an almanac; it’s not a novel (you already asked that one); it’s only partly a biography; it’s not an airline timetable; it’s not a repair manual for a 1998 Toyota Camry. Hope this helps, Mr. Spambot.
No, it is not. The Biblical literature encompasses dozens of genres, but to my knowledge no part of it is considered the work of a diarist.
